files.patch:
@@ -53,1 +53,1 @@
-	<!-- copy non-java resources -->
+	<!-- copies non-java resources -->
@@ -61,1 +61,1 @@
-	<!-- unpack library jars -->
+	<!-- unpacks the library jars -->
@@ -71,1 +71,1 @@
-	<!-- build app jar -->
+	<!-- builds the app jar -->
@@ -84,7 +84,1 @@
-	<!-- generate digest -->
-	<target name="sha-jar" depends="make-jar">
-		<checksum file="build/jars/${TARGET}.jar" algorithm="sha-256" forceoverwrite="yes" fileext=".sha256.txt" />
-	</target>
-
-
-	<!-- copy jar to base dir -->
+	<!-- copies jar to base dir -->
@@ -96,2 +90,2 @@
-	<!-- build all -->
-	<target name="build-all" depends="compile, copy-resources, make-jar, sha-jar, copy-jar" />
+	<!-- builds all -->
+	<target name="build-all" depends="compile, copy-resources, make-jar, copy-jar" />
@@ -99,0 +93,3 @@
+	
+	<!-- alias to build-all target, to make it compatible with the rest of the apps -->
+	<target name="jar" depends="build-all" />

@@ -39,1 +39,0 @@
-            new DemoPage("Chart", ChartPage::new),

@@ -31,1 +31,2 @@
- *
+ * Descriptor for an individual test (a "demo").
+ * Encapsulates the title and a generator that creates the Pane.

@@ -43,1 +43,1 @@
- * All the calls, excepr useProvider(), are expected to happen in an FX application thread.
+ * All the calls, except useProvider(), are expected to happen in an FX application thread.
